amsu.description: This is the AMSU data; it contains one message type and a bunch of radiances.

MSGTYPE_1.name: amsu_sample_data
MSGTYPE_1.description: Sample AMSU dataset with temperature brightness values and geospatial metadata.

adpsfc.description: The surface data, with 4 different sets of data.

NC000001.name: WMOSYNOP_fixed
NC000001.description: Synoptic - fixed land (originating from WMO SYNOP bulletins).

NC000002.name: WMOSYNOP_mobile
NC000002.description: Synoptic - mobile land (originating from WMO SYNOP bulletins). Mostly India data.

NC000007.name: BUFRSYNOP_fixed
NC000007.description: The surface data from METAR stations at airports. Mostly US/Europe data.

adpupa.description: Upper-air data from radiosondes with pressure level observations.

NC002001.name: conv-adpupa-NC002001
NC002001.description: ADP Upper-air data; Rawinsonde - fixed land
